text: aur tumako kya ho gaya ki (apana maal) khuda kee raah mein kharch nahin karate haaloki saare aasamaan va zameen ka maalik va vaaris khuda hee hai tumamen se jis shakhsh ne phateh (makka) se pahale (apana maal) kharch kiya aur jehaad kiya (aur jisane baad mein kiya) vah baraabar nahin unaka darja un logon se kaheen badh kar hai jinhonne baad mein kharch kiya aur jehaad kiya aur (yoon to) khuda ne nekee aur savaab ka vaayada to sabase kiya hai aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase khoob vaaqif hai
